Race.SpecificTitle: City Marshal -- City Court, City of Franklin
City of Patterson, HRC Amend. No. 1 -- Sec. 3-05(2) - CC
Race.SummaryText:
City of Patterson Home Rule Charter Amendment Propositions
Proposition No. 1
Race.FullText: Shall Section 3-05(2) of the City of Patterson Home Rule Charter be amended to read as follows: (1) the mayor shall, without need for approval of the city council, have the authority to appoint all city employees except those working within the police department; and (2) the mayor shall, with the need for approval of the city council and in accordance with personnel policies adopted by the city council, have the authority to suspend, demote, otherwise discipline and remove all city employees except those working within the police department?

Race.SpecificTitle: City of Patterson, HRC Amend. No. 2 -- Sec. 4-03 - CC
Race.SummaryText:
City of Patterson Home Rule Charter Amendment Propositions
Proposition No. 2
Race.FullText: Shall Section 4-03 of the City of Patterson Home Rule Charter be amended so as to add a provision therein authorizing the police chief, without city council approval but in accordance with personnel policies adopted by the city council, to appoint city employees working within the police department, and with the approval of the city council and in accordance with personnel policies adopted by the city council to suspend, otherwise discipline and remove city employees working within the police department, all as set forth in Ordinance No. 2017-07B adopted by the City Council of the City of Patterson, Louisiana on August 1, 2017?

Race.SpecificTitle: City of Patterson, HRC Amend. No. 3 -- Sec. 2-06(D) - CC
Race.SummaryText:
City of Patterson Home Rule Charter Amendment Propositions
Proposition No. 3
Race.FullText: Shall Section 2-06(D) of the City of Patterson Home Rule Charter be amended so as to provide that city council meeting agendas shall be posted, made available to the news media, published in the official journal, amended, added to, and action taken thereon all in accordance with state law, all as set forth in Ordinance No. 2017-07C adopted by the City Council of the City of Patterson, Louisiana on August 1, 2017?

Race.SpecificTitle: City of Patterson, HRC Amend. No. 4 -- Sec. 2-10(A)(11) - CC
Race.SummaryText:
City of Patterson Home Rule Charter Amendment Propositions
Proposition No. 4
Race.FullText: Shall Section 2-10(A)(11) of the City of Patterson Home Rule Charter be amended so as to provide that any conveyance or lease, or authorization of any conveyance or lease, of any lands or other immovable property of the city government be made by ordinance, all as set forth in Ordinance No. 2017-07D adopted by the City Council of the City of Patterson, Louisiana on August 1, 2017?

Race.SpecificTitle: Wax Lake East Drainage Dist. -- 2 Mills Renewal - BOC - 20 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Wax Lake East Drainage District Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Wax Lake East Drainage District of the Parish of St. Mary, Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to continue to levy a two (2) mills tax (the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the tax for one entire year being $280,000) on all the property subject to taxation in the District for a period of twenty (20) years, beginning with the year 2019 and ending with the year 2038, for the purpose of constructing, improving, maintaining and operating the drainage facilities in the District?
